Policy: Law No. 673 “On ecological education of the population”.
Policy_Content: This Law regulates legal, organizational, financial and economic principles of state policy in the sphere of ecological education of the population. State policy in the field of environmental education of the population shall be considered activities of the authorized state bodies aimed at ensuring conditions for ecological education of the population and coordination of activities of public bodies, social associations and individuals related to formation of general and specifically ecological culture of the individual and the society. The basic principles of state policy in the field of ecological education shall be as follows: (a) ensuring state guarantees for obtaining by a citizen of the minimum required ecological knowledge; (b) compulsory ecological education at all levels of the educational system; (c) inclusion of ecological education in all target and sectoral programs; (d) targeting ecological education for the implementation of environmental protection objectives; (e) implementation of the state policy regarding ecological education; (f) transparency and openness in the implementation of state policy in the field of ecological education; and (g) public participation in the implementation of state policy in the sphere of ecological education.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Asia, Central Asia, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Landlocked Developing Countries, North Asia
Entry into force notes: This Law enters into force after its first official publication.

Policy: Law No. 671 “On food security”.
Policy_Content: This Law defines the main directions of state policy in the field of food security as integral part of state security, in accordance with generally accepted international principles and norms. Food security is a state of the national economy in which the domestic production output ensures food security of the country and guaranteed physical accessibility required for an active and healthy life, ensuring demographic growth. Food security and independence shall be ensured by a set of measures undertaken by public authorities aimed at creating guarantees of food accessibility for the population at optimal consumption rates, which are based on their availability mainly due to the national production. The main areas of ensuring food security and independence shall be as follows: (a) establishment of a list of basic foodstuffs; (b) ensuring the physical and economic accessibility of basic foodstuffs; (c) ensuring the production of agricultural raw materials and finished food that meets the requirements of technical regulations, standards and rules; (d) ensuring safe imports in accordance with the requirements of technical regulations, standards and rules; (e) activization of international trade, including the balance of exports and imports; (f) implementation of an effective agrarian policy; (g) organization of the operational procurement, delivery and distribution of basic foodstuffs for the population in the event of a food crisis or the threat of its occurrence; (h) monitoring the state of food and agricultural raw materials market; and (i) promotion of information and communication technologies in the trade in food and agricultural raw materials. Basic principles of ensuring food security shall be as follows: (a) ensuring equal access to the food market of organizations and enterprises, regardless of legal and organizational forms thereof; (b) preventing the reduction of the achieved level of food security at the state level; (c) provision of state support to domestic producers of agricultural products, raw materials and foodstuffs on a competitive basis; (d) program-target method for the formation of food resources; (e) making management decisions based on monitoring in order to form and maintain a balance in the domestic food market; (f) promoting the role of non-profit, sectoral and other organizations in the production, supply and processing of agricultural commodities, raw materials and foodstuffs; (g) openness of information on the state of the food market; (h) full harmonization of requirements for food products; (i) conformity of the quality of produced, imported and sold food products with the requirements of legislation on food safety; (j) formation, updating and replenishment of state resources of food products, regardless of the impact of internal and external factors; (k) organization of effective agricultural production on the basis of targeted use and management of natural resources in order to provide the population with food, and industry with agricultural raw materials in the amounts necessary for sustainable economic growth and social development of the country. The main measures of state support shall be as follows: (a) development of the material and technical base of agricultural producers, taking into account the efficiency of land reclamation and irrigation facilities through the leasing of agricultural machinery and equipment; (b) financing of programs for scientific support of the development of the industry, improvement of the organizational and economic mechanisms for the functioning of agricultural and processing organizations for the development of seed production, growing seedlings, selection of agricultural plants, pedigree business, poultry farming; (c) promoting the use of advanced technologies for the production, processing, storage and rational use of foodstuffs; (d) assistance to the creation of modern facilities of wholesale trade (distribution centers, wholesale food markets and complexes); (e) formation of an effective system of product distribution of agricultural commodities, raw materials and foodstuffs from producers to the final consumer; (f) development of transport and warehouse infrastructure of food wholesale; and (g) scientific support for monitoring of food security and the implementation of other measures stipulated by law. This Law consists of IV Chapters divided into 18 Articles. Chapter I lays down general provisions. Chapter II establishes competence of state bodies for ensuring food security. Chapter III regards food security information support. Chapter IV lays down final provisions.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Food & nutrition
Keyword: Food security,Policy/planning,Food sovereignty,Governance,Agricultural commodities,Subsidy/incentive,Framework law,Basic legislation,Nutrition,Processing/handling
Geographical_area: Asia, Central Asia, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Landlocked Developing Countries, North Asia
Entry into force notes: This Law enters into force on the date of its official publication.

Policy: Ley Nº 073 -  Ley de deslinde jurisdiccional.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley tiene por objeto regular los ámbitos de vigencia, dispuestos en la Constitución Política del Estado, entre la jurisdicción indígena originaria campesina y las otras jurisdicciones reconocidas constitucionalmente; y determinar los mecanismos de coordinación y cooperación entre estas jurisdicciones, en el marco del pluralismo jurídico. Se regulan el ámbito de vigencia personal, material, y territorial de la jurisdicción indígena originaria campesina, los que deberán concurrir simultáneamente para su ejercicio. Se establece asimismo la obligación de la jurisdicción indígena originaria campesina, la ordinaria, la agroambiental y las demás jurisdicciones legalmente reconocidas de cooperarse mutuamente para el cumplimiento y realización de sus fines y objetivos.
Subject: General

Policy: Arrêté conjoint du ministre de l'agriculture et de la pêche maritime, du ministre de l'intérieur et du ministre de l'économie et des finances n° 3413-10 modifiant et complétant l'arrêté n° 361-10 fixant les montants et les taux de subventions accordés aux projets d'agrégation.
Policy_Content: Une aide financière de l'Etat sous forme de subvention est accordée aux projets d'investissements agricoles réalisés dans le cadre de l'agrégation, c'est à dire au sein d'une organisation basée sur le regroupement d'agriculteurs pour la réalisation de projets d'investissements agricoles dits " Projets d'agrégation" pour la production, la valorisation et la commercialisation de produits agricoles. Le présent arrêté modifie les montants et les taux de subventions accordés aux projets d'agrégation.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Africa, Mediterranean, NEAR EAST AND NORTH AFRICA, North Atlantic, Northern Africa

Policy: Arrêté conjoint du ministre de l'agriculture et de la pêche maritime, du ministre de l'intérieur et du ministre de l'économie et des finances n° 3417-10 fixant les modalités de l'aide de l'Etat aux aménagements hydro-agricoles.
Policy_Content: Les aménagements hydro-agricoles destinés à l'équipement des propriétés agricoles en systèmes d'irrigation localisée ou de complément  ainsi que les améliorations foncières peuvent bénéficier d'une subvention de l'Etat selon les modalités fixées par le présent arrêté. Les aménagements des propriétés agricoles en systèmes d'irrigation localisée ne peuvent bénéficier de l'aide de l'Etat prévue par le présent arrêté que s'ils sont conçus et réalisés dans le cadre d'un projet global permettant l'économie d'eau d'irrigation.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Water

Policy: National Policy on Disaster Management 2010.
Policy_Content: The National Policy on Disaster Management is a core component of Sri Lanka’s national regime for disaster management. It articulates agreed overarching principles and preferred outcomes for disaster management in Sri Lanka. It also provides policy directives to address the issues such as inadequate coordination among stakeholders agencies, duplication of efforts and insufficient policy directives to reduce the human and economic impacts of disasters which were identified in the aftermath of the 2004 Tsunami and the other recent disaster situations.

The recipient public entity receiving the right of use must register the transfer with the Public Registry of Georgia.

Policy: Ordinance amending the Waste Incineration Ordinance.
Policy_Content: The present Ordinance introduces some amendments to the Waste Incineration Ordinance (BGBl. II No. 389/2002). In particular, the following articles are added: Duties of waste producers (art. 5a); Requirements for waste to be incinerated in incineration plants (art. 6a); Recording and reporting duties concerning the incineration of waste (art. 11a); Alternative fuel (art. 18a); Transitional provisions on waste (art. 19a).
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Waste & hazardous substances

Policy: Orden ARM/3367/2010 - Organiza la Red Rural Nacional.
Policy_Content: El presente Orden establece la organización de la Red Rural Nacional, que es un sistema integrado de acciones y relaciones al servicio de la colaboración y la cooperación entre los distintos sectores e instituciones, públicos y privados, vinculados al medio rural.

Policy: Resolución Nº 182.529 - Modifica la Resolución Nº 180.018, sobre criterios para la aprobación de los planes, programas y proyectos con recursos del Fondo de Apoyo Financiero para la Energización de las Zonas Rurales Interconectadas (FAER).
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución modifica la que establece los criterios generales para la aprobación de los planes, programas y proyectos con recursos del Fondo de Apoyo Financiero para la Energización de las Zonas Rurales Interconectadas (FAER), en el sentido de ampliar el plazo para aprobar el Reglamento para la presentación, revisión, evaluación y aprobación de los Planes de Expansión de Cobertura Eléctrica por parte de los Operadores de Red, hasta el 30 de julio de 2011.

Policy_Content: La presente Resolución modifica el procedimiento para otorgar subsidios del sector eléctrico en las Áreas de Servicio Exclusivo de las Zonas No Interconectadas Continentales, respecto a la fórmula general para la determinación de los subsidios de los usuarios.

Policy: Order No. 515 of the Federal Forest Agency validating the Regulation on forest management for the purpose of exploration of subsoil, mining and extraction of minerals.
Policy_Content: This Order sets the requirements to forest management for the purpose of exploration of subsoil, mining and extraction of minerals. In order to obtain permission for carrying out geological exploration on plots of forestland without concession thereof the applicant shall submit to the local self-government application containing: (a) applicant data (organizational and legal form, legal address, banking data, and copy of identity document for individual entrepreneurs; (b) map specifying location and area of the plot of forestland projected for exploration; (c) copy of state registration as legal person or individual entrepreneur; and (d) copy of exploration licence and copy of exploration contract for public needs. Application shall be examined and the decision shall be made within 30 days from the date of application.
Subject: Forestry, Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Resolución Nº 070-2010-OEFA ─ Directiva para la Formulación, Ejecución y Evaluación del Plan Anual de Evaluación y Fiscalización Ambiental de las entidades que conforman el Sistema Nacional de Evaluación y Fiscalización Ambiental.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba la Directiva para la Formulación, Ejecución y Evaluación del Plan Anual de Evaluación y Fiscalización Ambiental de las entidades que conforman el Sistema Nacional de Evaluación y Fiscalización Ambiental, con el objeto de para garantizar el cumplimiento efectivo de las actividades de planificación de las acciones de fiscalización ambiental a cargo de las Entidades de Fiscalización Ambiental.
Subject: Environment gen.

Policy: Decree No. 328 of 2010 (XII. 27.) of the Government regarding the appointment of agricultural administrative organs of capital and county governmental offices.
Policy_Content: According to this Decree the food-chain safety and animal health directorate, the plant and soil protection directorate, the forestry directorate and the agricultural directorate shall act as organs of the capital and county level agricultural government offices. This Decree determines in detailes which other authorities are involved in the administration of each specific matter.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Livestock, Food & nutrition, Land & soil, Cultivated plants
Geographical_area: Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries
Entry into force notes: The consolidated text of the Decree entered into force on 11 March 2013.

Policy: Regional Law No. 1301-01-ZMO “On forest management for hunting”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law establishes rules for forest management for hunting. Hunting management shall be carried out in accordance with forest lease contracts and the lease holders shall be authorized to carry out arrangements for conservation of wild fauna species subject to hunting and natural habitats thereof. Hunting managers must: (a) care for the forests; (b) prevent environmental damages; (c) observe forest fire prevention rules and regulations; and (d) ensure free and free of charge access and stay of citizens in forests. Use of timber, obtained as a result of timber extraction,  for conservation of wild fauna species and natural habitats thereof shall be authorized to the amount and within the limits established by forest management project.
Subject: Forestry, Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Forest management/forest conservation,Contract/agreement,Forest fires,Timber,Timber extraction/logging,Wild fauna,Management/conservation,Hunting/capture,Protection of habitats
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force 10 days after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Ministerial Resolution No.1734 of 2010 on the prohibition of acts harmful to hygiene and cultivation in agricultural holdings
Policy_Content: This Resolution consisting of 4 articles aims at regulating actions that could be harmful to hygiene and cultivation in agricultural sector. In particular it (i) prohibits the collection of waste, dead animals, construction waste, plastic waste, agricultural and animal residues, and pesticide and fertilizer containers, and any other residues inside or outside the agricultural holdings; and (ii) obliges the owners of the agricultural holdings (a) to clean them from inside and outside and not to keep any waste that has to be transferred to the designated places, (b) to comply with the sanitary specifications of sewage for the workers' housing, preventing the use of mixing ponds, and (c) to respect the specifications for collecting the organic composting, which provides for the need to store natural fertilizers in covered basins.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Livestock, Water, Waste & hazardous substances
Keyword: Soil pollution/quality,Hygiene/sanitary procedures,Hazardous waste,Sewerage,Solid waste,Waste disposal,Waste prevention,Waste management
Geographical_area: Middle East, NEAR EAST AND NORTH AFRICA, Persian Gulf, Western Asia
Entry into force notes: This Resolution enters into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Arrêté ministériel portant diverses mesures d'exécution de l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 21 octobre 2010 visant à octroyer une prime pour l'installation d'un chauffe-eau solaire.
Policy_Content: Le présent arrêté ministériel porte diverses mesures d'exécution de l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 21 octobre 2010 visant à octroyer une prime pour l'installation d'un chauffe-eau solaire. En outre, l’ arrêté transpose partiellement l'article 13 de la Directive 2009/28/CE du Parlement européen et du Conseil du 23 avril 2009 relative à la promotion de l'utilisation de l'énergie produite à partir de sources renouvelables et modifiant puis abrogeant les Directives 2001/77/CE et 2003/30/CE.  Le texte comprend 8 articles et 2 annexes.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe
Entry into force notes: Le présent arrêté entre en vigueur le 1er janvier 2011.

Policy: Decree No. 310 of the Cabinet of Ministers validating the Regulation on State Commission on Stocks of Minerals subordinated to the Cabinet of Ministers.
Policy_Content: This Decree establishes that State Commission on Stocks of Minerals shall be authorized special body carrying out state assessment of geological materials and validating stocks of minerals. The Commission shall carry out the following functions: (a) validation of the conditions for reliable assessment of the stocks of minerals for rational mining and extraction with the consideration of ecological criteria; (b) validation of total available stock of minerals; (c) carrying out state audit of geological materials; and (d) realization of state policy for classification and calculation of stocks of minerals.
Subject: Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Aral Sea, Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Central Asia, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Landlocked Developing Countries, North Asia

Policy: Decree No. 170 of the Chief State Sanitary Inspector validating sanitary regulation.
Policy_Content: This Decree establishes approximately safe impact level of pollutants to the atmospheric air of the populated areas by establishing limits of contents of hexadecanol 36653-82-4 and methyl iodide in the atmospheric air.
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Regional Law No. 547 “On cultural heritage”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law regulates relations in the sphere of conservation, management and promotion of cultural heritage. Boundaries of the objects of cultural heritage, land tenure regime within the aforesaid boundaries and land use planning arrangements shall be validated by the Regional Government. Boundaries of protected areas containing objects of historical and cultural heritage shall be established and mapped in accordance with substantiating documentation.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force 10 days after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Regional Law No. 460-ZZK “On concession of subsoil parcels containing widespread minerals for mining”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law establishes that concession of subsoil parcels containing widespread minerals for mining shall be subject to mandatory issuance of mining licence. Mining licence holder shall have exclusive rights to mining and subsoil management within the boundaries of allotted subsoil plot. Mining licence shall also contain authorization for exploration and prospecting of subsoil.
Subject: Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force ten days after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Regulation on energy audit and official control for buildings.
Policy_Content: This Regulation prescribes all standards and necessary conditions for the implementation of energy audit of buildings in order to establish ways for managing wit energy demand, energy costs and determination of cost-effective opportunities to reduce the final energy consumption of buildings and estimate the possible realization of energy savings after the implementation of energy efficiency measures, and specifically provides: the process of conducting of the audit; the content of the report on the implementation of the energy audit; the procedure for the inspection of the heating system in buildings; the content of the report on the implementation of the control check of the heating systems; the procedure for the inspection of the air conditioning in buildings; the content of the report on the implementation of the control check of the air conditioning; the annual limit value of final energy consumption that will be used to determine the specific category of the energy consumer; and other conditions for the implementation of energy audit.
Subject: Energy
Keyword: Energy conservation/energy production,Environmental audit,Inspection,Data collection/reporting,Public participation
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force eight days after its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Regulation on the authorization for the energy audit of buildings.
Policy_Content: This Regulation provides full conditions and procedures for: a) the issuance, renewal and revocation of the authorization to conduct energy audit or inspection of buildings and the inspection of heating and air conditioning in the building and training programs for persons who perform energy audits and building control inspection; b) keeping of the register of persons authorized to conduct energy audit for buildings and other related inspection and control duties; c) the supervision of authorized personnel conducting energy audit.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force eight days after its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Regional Law No. 65-RZ amending Regional Law No. 13-RZ “on establishment of the modalities and rates of timber extraction, collection and harvesting of non-timber alimentary and non-alimentary forest products and collection of medicinal plants by citizens for individual personal needs”.
Policy_Content: Article 1 shall be amended to add the following wording: “Citizens shall be granted the right of timber extraction for individual personal needs for heating, housing construction and other needs in accordance with purchase and sale contracts for timber extraction of forest species located on public and municipal land”.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force on the date of its official publication.

Policy: PURA Enforcement Regulations 2010.
Policy_Content: These Regulations, amde under section 54 of the Gambia Public Utilities Regulatory Authority Act 2001 define monitoring and  enforcement powers or the Gambia Public Utilities Regulatory Authority and provide with respect to some other mattres for the control of supply of public utility services by licence holders. The Authority may at its  discretion, but subject to certain limitations, impose administrative fines for  enforcement purposes and may revoke licences.
Subject: Energy, Water
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Least Developed Countries, North Atlantic, Sahel, Western Africa

Policy: Resolution No. 21/2010 approving the Statute of the Ministry of Women and Social Action.
Policy_Content: This Resolution approves the Statute of the Ministry of Women and Social Action, created by Presidential Decree No. 13/2005 of 4 February. This Statute, consisting of 4 Chapters, establishes composition, duties and responsibilities of this institution entitled: to promote women empowerment in political, socio-economic and cultural areas; to promote family members protection and decision-making balance; to promote the assistance to vulnerable groups, in particular women, youth, elders, handicapped and other discriminated groups; to promote the coordination of governmental and non-governmental actions working in gender and social actions areas.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Indian Ocean, Least Developed Countries
Entry into force notes: This Resolution enters into force on the day of its publication.

Policy: Regional Law No. 136-OZ “On administrative liability in the sphere of organization and functioning of collection and shipping point for timber”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law establishes administrative liability for offences in the sphere of organization and functioning of collection and shipping point for timber. This Regional Law classifies as offences non-compliance with the provisions of the Regional Law No. 136-OZ “On administrative liability in the sphere of organization and functioning of collection and shipping point for timber”, recording of inaccurate information in the registration log, non-submittal of monthly declaration related to accepted, processed and shipped timber. Case of the aforesaid offences shall be examined by justice of peace.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force 10 days after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Biofuels (Sustainability Criteria) Regulations, 2010 (L.N. 553 of 2010).
Policy_Content: These Regulations give effect to articles 17, 18, 19 and 21 of Directive 2009/28/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council on the promotion of the use of energy from renewable sources as well as to paragraphs (b), (c), (d) and (e) of article 7 of Directive 98/70/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council relating to the quality of petrol and diesel fuels. In particular, these provisions set out sustainability criteria for biofuels and bioliquids and further regulate verification for compliance with such criteria. Regulation 5 and the Schedule concern calculation of the greenhouse gas impact of biofuels and bioliquids.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Energy
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Mediterranean, Southern Europe

Policy: Resolution No. 397 of 2010 of Georgian Government on Joint Actions in Case of Alert on Discovering Nuclear and Radioactive Substances at Border Points, Airports, Ports and Maritime Spaces of Georgia
Policy_Content: The Resolution regulates the alert system which is used when radioactive substance is identified at Georgian borders. It consists of 11 articles: Scope of regulation (1); Definition of terms (2); Responsible agencies (3); Identifying and seizing substances subject to radioactive control (4); Assessing, neutralizing, packaging, transporting, isolating, storing substances subject to radioactive control and monitoring of these procedures (5); Training of specialists (6); Main principles of response (7); Responding to an alert when substances subject to radioactive control are identified (8); Responding to an alert when I and II group substances are identified (9); Responding to an alert when III and IV group substances are identified (10); and Measures to be undertaken for radioactive safety in Georgian ports and airports (11). The purpose of the regulation is to eradicate illegal circulation of nuclear and radioactive substances and to ensure nuclear safety of Georgia.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Asia, Black Sea, Eastern Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Western Asia

Policy: Decreto Nº 4.729 - Modifica el Decreto Nº 951, que reglamenta parcialmente la Ley Nº 387, sobre medidas para la prevención del desplazamiento forzado.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto modifica el que reglamenta la vivienda y el subsidio de vivienda para la población desplazada, respecto al cálculo del valor del subsidio familiar de vivienda asignado por el Fondo Nacional de Vivienda – Fonvivienda.

Policy_Content: El presente Decreto Supremo modifica el Reglamento operativo del Fondo para la Estabilización de Precios de los Combustibles Derivados del Petróleo, en aspectos relacionados con la aplicación del impuesto al rodaje, impuesto general a las ventas e impuesto de promoción municipal.

Policy: Arrêté du Gouvernement wallon relatif aux certificats et labels de garantie d'origine pour les gaz issus de renouvelables.
Policy_Content: Le présent arrêté du gouvernement wallon est relatif aux certificats et labels de garantie d'origine pour les gaz issus de renouvelables. Le texte comprend 21 articles répartis en 7 chapitres comme suit: Définitions (Ier); Certification des sites de production de gaz issus de renouvelables (II); Comptage, conditions et procédure d'octroi et de suspension des labels de garantie d'origine de gaz issus de renouvelables (III); Banque de données et marché des labels de garantie d'origine de gaz issus de renouvelables (IV); Rapport annuel (VI); Dispositions finales (VII).

Policy: Resolución Nº 142 - NTE INEN 699 sobre determinación de partículas livianas de áridos.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba con carácter de voluntaria la Norma Técnica Ecuatoriana NTE INEN 699 (Áridos. Determinación de partículas livianas), que establece el procedimiento para la determinación del porcentaje de partículas livianas en el árido mediante una separación por decantación y flotación en un líquido denso de gravedad específica adecuada.
Subject: Mineral resources

Policy: European Communities (Port State Control) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 656 of 2010).
Policy_Content: These Regulations implement Community legislation that seeks to reinforce and improve the effectiveness of port State control through establishing a new inspection regime relating to standards for ship safety, pollution prevention and shipboard living and working conditions. The Marine Survey Office is designated as the competent authority in the State for the purposes of these Regulations and Directive 2009/16/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council on port State control. The competent authority shall ensure that inspections are carried out in accordance with these Regulations and shall select ships for inspection based on the ships’ risk profiles.
Subject: Sea, Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Atlantic Ocean Islands, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe

Policy: Regulation on the form and content of the list of documents containing information on the environment and its protection.
Policy_Content: This Regulation of the Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development, which is composed of 13 paragraphs, establishes the way of functioning and organization of the National Commission for Environmental Impact Assessment and regional commissions for environmental impact assessment (EIA). The National Commission is a consultative and advisory body of the General Director of Environmental Protection for the matters concerning EIA. The National Commission takes into account forecasts of EIA, reports on environmental impact of projects, studies and information useful for comprehensive analysis of individual cases.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries
Entry into force notes: This Regulation entered into force on 30 December 2010.

Policy: Regulation amending the Regulation on the procedure and criteria for the grant of the easements in forests and/or forest land owned by the Croatian Republic for the exploitation of mineral resources.
Policy_Content: This Regulation amends certain provisions of articles 3, 5, 6 and 7 of the Regulation on the procedure and criteria for the grant of the easements in forests and/or forest land owned by the Croatian Republic for the exploitation of mineral resources (Official Gazette 133/07).
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force on the day of its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Electricity and Electricity Organization Act 2010.
Policy_Content: A piece of basic legislation in the field of electricity production and its organization. The objectives of the present Act are, inter alia, to make available to the people of Austria high quality electricity at a reasonable price; to continue to increase the big part of renewable energy in the Austrian energy production; to take into consideration the safety of the production, the guarantee of supply, and above all the environmental compatibility. The Act contains at the outset a definition clause relating to various terms therein employed such as “production”, “independent producers”, “transmission”, “distribution”, “client”, “ultimate consumer”, “net”’. The text consists of 114 articles divided into 14 Parts as follows: General principles (1); Inner organization and transparency of accounting (2); Electricity production plants and contracts for electricity delivery (3); Operating nets (4); Electricity producers (5); Obligations of suppliers and energy traders (6);  Electricity producers (7); Special electricity producing plants (8); Obligations with respect to customers (9); Balance groups (10); Supervising tasks (11); Competent authorities (12); Special provisions for organizations (13); Penalties and fines (14).
Subject: Energy
Keyword: Basic legislation,Energy conservation/energy production,Environmental standards,Renewable energy,Policy/planning,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Offences/penalties
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Western Europe

Policy: Energy Control Act.
Policy_Content: Article 2 of the above-mentioned Act rules that to facilitate the regulatory functions in the electricity and natural gas industry a public institution is set up under the name of “E-Control Austria for the regulation of the electricity and natural gas industry”. The text – consisting of 45 articles deals with the following aspects: general targets, organs, Board of directors, duties of the Board, functions of the Board, legal aid, regulatory commission and its tasks, supervisory Board, and its tasks, parliamentary control, advisory Board and its functions. Energy Advisory Board, general conditions, monitoring and surveillance, dispute settlement, compliance with the guidelines, staff, budget, annual financial statement, costs of regulation, right to obtain information, legal assistance, proceedings, liability, Labour Relation Act, entry into force and transitional provisions.
Subject: Energy
Keyword: Institution,Energy conservation/energy production,Natural gas,Inspection,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Data collection/reporting
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Western Europe

Policy: Real Decreto Nº 1738/2010 - Fija objetivos obligatorios de biocarburantes para los años 2011, 2012 y 2013.
Policy_Content: El presente Real Decreto se propone el establecimiento de los objetivos anuales obligatorios mínimos de venta o consumo de biocarburantes con fines de transporte, para los años 2011, 2012 y 2013. A tal fin, se fijan tres objetivos que se expresan como contenido energético mínimo, en relación al contenido energético en gasolinas, en gasóleos y en el total de gasolinas y gasóleos vendidos o consumidos.
Subject: Energy
Keyword: Energy conservation/energy production,Renewable energy,Subsidy/incentive,Transport/storage,Internal trade,Certification,Natural gas,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Environmental planning

Policy: Real Decreto Nº 1737/2010 - Reglamento por el que se regulan las inspecciones de buques extranjeros en puertos españoles.
Policy_Content: El presente Reglamento tiene por objeto regular las inspecciones de buques extranjeros en aguas en las que España ejerza soberanía, derechos soberanos o jurisdicción, con el fin de reducir significativamente el número de buques que incumplan las normas mediante la aplicación de las siguientes medidas:  a) la exigencia de un cumplimiento riguroso de la normativa internacional y comunitaria sobre seguridad marítima, protección marítima, protección del medio ambiente marino y condiciones de vida y de trabajo a bordo de los buques de cualquier pabellón; b) el establecimiento de criterios comunes para el control de los buques y la armonización de los procedimientos de su inspección e inmovilización; c) la aplicación de un sistema de control de buques, basado en las inspecciones realizadas en la Unión Europea y en la región del Memorando de acuerdo de París.
Subject: Environment gen., Sea
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Mediterranean, North Atlantic, North-East Atlantic, Southern Europe

Policy: Rheinland-Pfalz Geo-Data Infrastructure Law.
Policy_Content: The present Law provides the legal framework for the development and operation of the geo-data infrastructure of Rheinland-Pfalz being part of the national geo-data infrastructure. The text consists of 15 articles divided into 6 Parts as follows: General provisions (1); Requirements for geo-data infrastructure (2); Electronic net-work (3); Use of geo-data (4); Final provisions (5). Three Annexes are enclosed.

Policy: Electricity and Electricity Organization Act 2010.
Policy_Content: The objectives of the present Act are, inter alia, to make available to the people of Austria high quality electricity at a reasonable price; to continue to increase the big part of renewable energy in the Austrian energy production; to take into consideration the safety of the production, the guarantee of supply, and above all the environmental compatibility. The Act contains at the outset a definition clause relating to various terms therein employed such as “production”, “independent producers”, “transmission”, “distribution”, “client”, “ultimate consumer”, “net”’.The text consists of114 articles divided into 15 Parts as follows: General principles (1); Inner organization and transparency of accounting (2); Electricity production plants and contracts for electricity delivery (3); Operating nets (4); Electricity producers (5); Obligations of suppliers and energy traders (6); Electricity producers (7); Special electricity producing plants (8); Obligations with respect to customers (9); Balance groups (10); Supervising tasks (11); Competent authorities (12); Special provisions for organizations (13); Penalties and fines (14); Transitional and penalties (15).
Subject: Energy
Keyword: Basic legislation,Energy conservation/energy production,Environmental standards,Renewable energy,Policy/planning,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Offences/penalties
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Western Europe

Policy: Regulations of Beijing Municipality on Management of Rural Collective-owned Assets.
Policy_Content: The purpose of these Regulation is to strengthen the management of rural collective-owned assets, and protect the legitimate rights and interests of the owners and operators thereof. The Regulations consist of 6 Chapters: General provisions (I); Ownership of rural collective-owned assets (II); Management right of rural collective-owned assets (III); Administration of rural collective-owned assets (IV); Legal Liabilities (V); Supplementary Provisions (VI).
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Land & soil
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Eastern Asia, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Law No. 14.258 establishing the State Coastal Management Policy.
Policy_Content: This Law, consisting of 7 Chapters, establishes the State Coastal Management Policy. This Policy aims at regulating and guiding the use and exploitation of natural resources within the coastal area of the State of Pernambuco, through adequate instruments, to improve the quality of life of local populations, to protect ecosystems, natural, cultural and historical heritages, etc. In addition, it aims at promoting the ecological balance considering the environment as a public heritage to be protected; promoting the use coastal land planning and use of natural resources, optimizing the control and management instruments to the coastal zone; planning and establishing baselines to mange socio-economic activities within coastal zones, in an integrated, decentralized and participated way, guaranteeing the sustainable use of natural resources existing in these areas; promoting and supporting the preservation, conservation, rehabilitation and control of representative coastal areas; promoting the development of research activities related to adaptation measures to mitigate climate change in these areas; etc.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Environment gen.
Keyword: Climate change,Environmental planning,Environmental standards,Policy/planning,Ecosystem preservation,Protection of habitats
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North Atlantic, South America, South Atlantic

Policy: Energy Control Act.
Policy_Content: Article 2 of the above-mentioned Act establishes that  to facilitate the regulatory functions in the electricity and natural gas industry a public institution is set up under the name of “E-Control Austria for the regulation of the electricity and natural gas industry”. The text, consisting of 45 articles, deals with the following aspects: general targets; organs; Board of directors; functions and duties of the Board; legal aid; regulatory commission and its tasks; supervisory Board, and its tasks; parliamentary control; advisory Board and its functions; Energy Advisory Board; monitoring and surveillance; dispute settlement; compliance with the guidelines; annual financial statement; costs of regulation; right to obtain information; legal assistance; proceedings, liability; entry into force and transitional provisions.

Policy: Decree No. 306 of 2010 (XII. 23.) Korm. of the Government on the protection of the air.
Policy_Content: This Decree applies to those entities whose activities, facilities or products pollute or may pollute the air. This Decree is composed of four chapters. After providing general rules of air protection, Chapter II provides rules regarding standards of air quality. It contains special provision with regard to the establishment of stationary sources of air pollution, monitoring system of air pollution levels, designation of air pollution agglomerations and zones, air quality  and ozone reduction plans, smog alert plan, transboundary air pollution. Chapter III contains rules concerning the operation of air polluting sources. This chapter regulates in detail the authorization of operation of stationary sources, data reporting and sanctions (clean air protection penalty).
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Keyword: Ozone layer,Transboundary effects,Data collection/reporting,Offences/penalties,Air quality/air pollution,Environmental standards,Pollution control
Geographical_area: Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries
Entry into force notes: First entry into force on 15 January 2011. The consolidated version of the Decree entered into force on 2 November 2013.

Policy: Regional Law No. 882-OZ “On modalities of timber extraction by citizens for individual personal needs”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law establishes that citizens shall have the right for timber extraction of forest species for individual personal needs in accordance with purchase and sale contract of forest species. The aforesaid timber extraction shall be considered non-commercial and non-entrepreneurial activity. Personal individual needs shall be considered procurement of fuelwood for heating, housing construction and repairs of residential and non-residential edifices. Authorized amount and rates of timber extraction shall be set forth annually. Rates of timber extraction shall be established as follows: (a) fuelwood for heating – up to 20 cubic metres annually; (b) for housing construction – up to 100 cubic metres once in 20 years; (c) for other individual personal needs – up to 10 cubic metres once in 5 years.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force 10 days after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Décret n° 2010/384 du 23 décembre 2010 portant création, organisation et fonctionnement de l’Agence du service civique national de participation au développement.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret crée l’Agence du service civique national de participation au développement (ASCNPD), et fixe son organisation et son fonctionnement.  L’Agence est investie d’une mission de mobilisation des énergies pour le développement économique, social et culturel du pays, et de promotion du sentiment national et patriotique, du sens de la discipline, de la tolérance, de l’intérêt général, de la dignité du travail, de l’esprit civique et de la culture de la paix. A ce titre, elle assure: pour les jeunes de 17 à 21 ans concernés par la période obligatoire de soixante (60) jours: la formation au civisme, à l’éducation physique, sportive et culturelle; la consolidation de la solidarité et de l’intégration nationales; la formation au secourisme et à la protection civile; la sensibilisation à la protection de l’environnement. Pour des personnes qui s’engagent comme volontaires pour une période de six mois: le développement des aptitudes à la création des activités génératrices de revenus; la formation professionnelle; la réalisation des travaux d’intérêt général dans les domaines d’activités du secteur public ou privé. L’Agence organise ses activités sur l’ensemble du territoire national par le biais de ses annexes.
Subject: General
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Central Africa, North Atlantic

Policy: Ley Nº 71 - Ley de derechos de la madre tierra.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley reconoce los derechos de la Madre Tierra, así como las obligaciones y deberes del Estado Plurinacional y de la sociedad para garantizar el respeto de estos derechos, para el vivir bien de las generaciones presentes y futuras. Se entiende por Madre Tierra el sistema viviente dinámico conformado por la comunidad indivisible de todos los sistemas de vida y los seres vivos, interrelacionados, interdependientes y complementarios, que comparten un destino común. La Madre Tierra es considerada sagrada, desde las cosmovisiones de las naciones y pueblos indígena originario campesinos. Son principios rectores los siguientes: 1) Armonía; 2) Bien colectivo; 3) Garantía de regeneración de la Madre Tierra; 4) Respeto y defensa de los Derechos de la Madre Tierra; 5) No Mercantilización; 6) Interculturalidad. En virtud del principio de armonía, las actividades humanas, en el marco de la pluralidad y la diversidad, deben lograr equilibrios dinámicos con los ciclos y procesos inherentes a la Madre Tierra. Se crea la Defensoría de la Madre Tierra, cuya misión es velar por la vigencia, promoción, difusión y cumplimiento de los derechos de la Madre Tierra establecidos en esta Ley.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Environment gen., Water, Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Ecosystem preservation,Agroecology,Traditional knowledge/indigenous knowledge,Sustainable use,Pollution control,Soil pollution/quality,Freshwater quality/freshwater pollution,Sustainable development,Basic legislation,Biodiversity,Hunting/capture

Policy: Implementing Ordinance relating to the Engergy Fund.
Policy_Content: The present Ordinance implements the Ordinance on the Energy Fund of 22 September 2010. In particular, the Ordinance lays down provisions relating to the increase of contributions to the afore-mentioned Fund to the Canton Glarus on behalf of the Confederation. The text consists of 11 articles divided into 3 Parts as follows: Projects on energy issues concerning buildings (1); Projects concerning renewable energy (2); General provisions (3).
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe
Entry into force notes: The present Ordinance enters into force on 1 January 2011.

Policy: Cabinet Regulation No. 1176 of 2010 on Procedures for the Circulation of Fuel Containing Bio-products and Administration of the Relevant Excise Duty
Policy_Content: The Regulation prescribes the procedures for the circulation and administration of the relevant excise duty for: (1) unleaded petrol, the substitute products and components thereof, to which ethanol has been added, which has been acquired from agricultural raw materials and has been dehydrated (with the alcohol content of at least 99.5 per cent by volume) provided that the content of the absolute alcohol forms from 70 to 85 per cent (inclusive) by volume from the total quantity of products; (2) diesel fuel (gas oil), the substitute products and components thereof, to which biodiesel acquired from rapeseed oil is added – at least 30 per cent by volume of the total amount of products; (3) biodiesel fully acquired from rapeseed oil; (4) rapeseed oil, which is sold or used as heating fuel or fuel; and (5) kerosene, diesel fuel (gas oil) or fuel oil, the colorimetric index of which is less than 2.0 and the kinematic viscosity of which at 50oC is less than 25 mm2/s, and the substitute products and components thereof, if the abovementioned mineral oils are marked, they are used as heating fuel and if the rapeseed oil or biodiesel fuel acquired from rapeseed oil added thereto forms at least five per cent by volume from the total amount of products.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Northern Europe

Policy: Cabinet Regulation No. 1164 of 2010 on Procedures for Port State Control
Policy_Content: This Regulation prescribes the procedures for port State control. This Regulation shall apply to any foreign ship and its crew calling at a port or anchorage of Latvia to engage in a ship and port interface. An expanded inspection concerns in particular the overall condition of the following risk areas: (1) documentation; (2) hull and construction condition; (3) weathertight condition - leakproofness; (4) emergency systems; (5) radio communication; (6) cargo operations; (7) fire safety; (8) alarms; (9) living and working conditions; (10) navigation equipment; (11) life saving appliances; (12) dangerous goods; (13) propulsion and auxiliary machinery; and (14) pollution prevention.
Subject: Environment gen., Sea
Keyword: Marine pollution,Harbour,Procedural matters,Disasters,Navigation,Hazardous substances,Environmental standards,Protection of environment,Pollution control
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Northern Europe

Policy: Law No. 2818-VI “On the basic principles (strategy) of the state environmental policy of Ukraine for the period up to 2020.
Policy_Content: Basic principles (strategy) of the state environmental policy of Ukraine for the period up to 2020 is multi-sectoral document. The basic causes of the environmental problems of Ukraine are: (a) the inherited structure of the economy with the predominant share of resource and energy-intensive industries, the negative impact of which was aggravated by the transition to market conditions; (b) depreciation of fixed assets of industrial and transport infrastructure; (c) the existing system of public administration in the field of environmental protection, regulation of the use of natural resources, lack of a clear separation of environmental and economic functions; (d) insufficient formation of civil society institutions; (e) insufficient understanding of the priorities of preservation of the environment in the society and the benefits of sustainable development; and (f) non-compliance with environmental legislation. The purpose of the national environmental policy is to stabilize and improve the state of the natural environment of Ukraine by integrating environmental policy into the socio-economic development of Ukraine to ensure environmentally sound natural environment for life and health of the population, introduction of an ecologically balanced system of nature management and conservation of natural ecosystems. The main principles of the national environmental policy are: (a) strengthening the role of environmental management in the system of public administration of Ukraine in order to achieve the equality of the three components of development (economic, environmental, social), which predetermines the orientation of the priorities of sustainable development; (b) consideration of environmental consequences in the process of managerial decision-making when developing documents containing political and/or programmatic principles of state, sectoral (sectoral), regional and local development; (c) cross-sectoral partnership and stakeholder involvement; (d) prevention of emergency situations of natural and man-made nature, which envisages analysis and forecasting of environmental risks based on the results of strategic environmental assessment, state ecological expertise, and state environmental monitoring; (e) ensuring environmental security and maintenance of ecological balance on the territory of Ukraine, overcoming the consequences of the Chernobyl disaster; (f) the responsibility of the present generation for the preservation of the environment for the benefit of future generations; (g) participation of the public and business entities in the formation and implementation of environmental policy, as well as consideration of their proposals when improving environmental legislation; (h) liability for violation of environmental legislation; (i) priority of the requirement "polluter pays principle"; (k) responsibility of the executive authorities for the availability, timeliness and reliability of environmental information; and (l) state support and stimulation of domestic business entities that carry out modernization of production, aimed at reducing the negative impact on the natural environment.
Subject: Environment gen.
Keyword: Policy/planning,Governance,Sustainable development,Environmental security,Polluter pays principle,Public participation,Disasters,Early warning system/emergency intervention system,EIA,Risk assessment/management,Monitoring,Environmental audit,Ecosystem preservation,Public health,Access-to-information
Geographical_area: Black Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA

Policy: European Communities (Good Agricultural Practice for Protection of Waters) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 610 of 2010).
Policy_Content: These Regulations provide, for purposes of implementation of the give effect to Irelands Second Nitrates Action Programme, rules relative to good agricultural practice to protect waters against pollution from agricultural sources and prescribe measures for these purposes, including: periods when land application of fertilizers is prohibited; limits on the land application of fertilizers; storage requirements for livestock manure; and monitoring of the effectiveness of the measures in terms of agricultural practice and impact on water quality. They also concern minimization and storage of soiled water and ploughing and the use of non-selective herbicides.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Land & soil, Cultivated plants, Water
Keyword: Farming,Soil pollution/quality,Ecofriendly products/ecofriendly processes,Ecological production/organic production,Fertilizers/nutrients,Pollution control,Freshwater quality/freshwater pollution,Groundwater,Water quality standards,Surface water,Monitoring,Effluent waste water/discharge

Policy: Government Regulation No. 78/2010 concerning reclamation and post-mining.
Policy_Content: This Regulation provides for principles and mechanisms of reclamation and post-mining. Holders of mining, mineral, coal, mineral mining, coal mining, mining business permits and special mining business permits are obligated to perform reclamation activities during the whole phase of mining business to arrange, restore and improve the quality of the environment and ecosystem. Holders of mining exploration business permits and mining production operations business permits are obligated to perform both reclamation and post-mining, the latter being activities to be carried out after the completion of mining business activities to restore environmental and social function according to the local conditions in the entire mining area.
Subject: Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Indian Ocean, South-Eastern Asia
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force on 20 December 2010.

Policy_Content: La presente Resolución, al fin de impulsar el desarrollo y crecimiento constantes del biocombustible y de las energías renovables en Argentina, establece los volúmenes anuales de bioetanol tendientes al incremento de la participación del mismo en la mezcla final con combustibles fósiles. Policy: Ministerial Decree No. 1373 validating the Regulation on state subsoil monitoring.
Policy_Content: This Ministerial Decree establishes that state subsoil monitoring shall be the system of explorations related to the state of subsoil with a view of ensuring rational management of public stock of subsoil and timely identification of changes, evaluation, prevention and mitigation of the consequences of negative processes. The object of monitoring and exploration shall be national subsoil. State subsoil monitoring shall be integral part of state environmental monitoring. State subsoil monitoring system shall include: (a) groundwater monitoring; (b) monitoring of hazardous exogenous geological processes; (c) monitoring of hazardous endogenous geological processes; (d) monitoring of hydrocarbons deposits; (e) monitoring of solid minerals’ deposits; (f) monitoring of the plots of subsoil not related to exploration and mining purposes; and (g) monitoring of the plots of subsoil subject to economic activities impact.
Subject: Environment gen., Mineral resources, Water
Geographical_area: Aral Sea, Caspian Sea, Central Asia, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Landlocked Developing Countries, North Asia

Policy: Ley Nº 4.241/10 - Ley de restablecimiento de bosques protectores de cauces hídricos dentro del territorio nacional.
Policy_Content: Esta Ley declara de interés nacional el restablecimiento de bosques protectores de los cauces hídricos de la Región Oriental, y la conservación de los mismos y en la Región Occidental de la República del Paraguay, para contribuir al cumplimiento de medidas de adecuación y protección ambiental que se requieren para garantizar la integridad de los recursos hídricos. De acuerdo a lo establecido por esta Ley, los bosques protectores deberán ser conservados permanentemente en su estado natural. Aquellas propiedades que no los hayan conservado, deberán restablecerlos con especies nativas, para recuperarlos y conservarlos.
Subject: Forestry, Water

Policy: National Ordinance on the state of emergency (GT No. 27 of 2010).
Policy_Content: This Decree concerns declaration of the state of emergency in exceptional circumstances and duties and powers of executive organs in such circumstance. A declaration of a state of emergency shall be proclaimed by State Decree on proposal of the prime minister and shall be sent immediately to the States (parliament), the Government of the Kingdom, the Government of Netherlands, the Government of Aruba and the Government of Curaçao. Policy: Eco-Account Ordinance.
Policy_Content: The present Ordinance implements the Nature Protection Law of 13 December 2005. In particular, the Ordinance lays down measures relating to the establishment of an eco-account system in the State of Baden-Württemberg to simplify and particularly optimize the planning and realization of mitigation and compensatory measures within the environmental impact assessment (EIA) and other impact coverage systems. The text consists of 13 articles as follows: Sphere of application (1); Eco-account measures (2); Application procedures (3); Inclusion in the eco-account directory (4); Interest (5); Rights and obligations (6); Access to the eco-account (7); Valuation (8); Classification of eco-account (9); Trade with eco-account measures (10); Recognized bodies (11); Relation to building legislation (12); Transitional provisions (13); Entry into force (14). Two Annexes are enclosed.

Policy: Ley Nº 749 - Ley de Régimen Jurídico de Fronteras. Texto consolidado.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley de Régimen Jurídico de Fronteras, tiene por objeto establecer un régimen jurídico especial en el territorio fronterizo, terrestre, marítimo y aéreo, para garantizar la soberanía, la independencia, la integridad territorial, la seguridad interna, la protección del medio ambiente y los recursos naturales, así corno la inalienabilidad de los bienes inmuebles públicos y permitir el impulso y aplicación de una política integral de desarrollo. Se crea la Comisión Nicaragüense del Territorio Fronterizo (CNTF), como un órgano permanente de coordinación y consulta, entre las instituciones involucradas en esta Ley, para su aplicación e implementación, en plena observancia y respeto a las facultades, atribuciones y funciones que la Ley otorga a cada una de ellas, y que será coordinada por el Presidente de la República.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Land & soil, Sea, Water, Wild species & ecosystems

Policy: Resolución Nº 235-2010-OSINFOR ─ Reglamento del Registro y Proceso de Selección de Empresas y Personas Naturales autorizadas por el OSINFOR para la realización de Supervisión y Auditorías Quinquenales.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba el Reglamento del Registro y Proceso de Selección de Empresas y Personas Naturales autorizadas por el Organismo de Supervisión de los Recursos Forestales y de Fauna Silvestre (OSINFOR) para la realización de Supervisión y Auditorías Quinquenales. El presente Reglamento es aplicable al OSINFOR, a la Dirección de Supervisión de Concesiones Forestales y Fauna Silvestre (DSCFFS), a la Dirección de Supervisión de Permisos y Autorizaciones Forestales y de Fauna Silvestre (DSPAFFS), a las personas naturales y jurídicas especializadas inscritas en el Registro de Personas Naturales y Jurídicas Encargadas de las Supervisiones y/o Auditorias Quinquenales, y a los titulares de derechos de aprovechamiento de los recursos forestales y de fauna silvestre.
Subject: Forestry, Wild species & ecosystems
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Law No. 14.249 providing for environmental licensing offenses and administrative penalties for environmental illegal activity.
Policy_Content: This Law, consisting of 9 Chapters and 3 Annexes, provides for environmental licensing offenses and administrative penalties for environmental illegal activity. It establishes composition, duties and responsibilities of the State Agency of Environment (CPRH), entitled for the implementation of the State policy on environment and for improving and ensuring the quality of the environment in the State of Pernambuco, aiming at the sustainable development through the rational use of environmental resources, the preservation and rehabilitation of the environment, the control over pollution and environmental degradation, etc. The Agency is responsible for the management of environmental resources and projects exploiting natural resources, considered effectively or potentially polluting activities.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North Atlantic, South America, South Atlantic
Entry into force notes: This Law enters into force on the day of its publication.

Policy: Decreto Nº 4.672 - Crea la Comisión Intersectorial del Sector de la Economía Solidaria.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto crea la Comisión Intersectorial del Sector de la Economía Solidaria, cuyo fin será la coordinación de las acciones de las entidades públicas que formulan e implementan la política del sector de la Economía Solidaria y armonizar la regulación y políticas sectoriales pertinentes. La Comisión ejercerá, entre ottras, las siguientes funciones: 1)evaluar la normatividad del sector de la economía solidaria y proponer a las autoridades competentes para el correspondiente trámite los proyectos de ley, decretos y resoluciones que estime necesarios; 2) evaluar las disposiciones normativas y planteamientos que el sector de la economía solidaria considere como limitaciones a su desarrollo empresarial, con el fin de proponer soluciones, cuando el ordenamiento jurídico lo permita; 3) evaluar el actual esquema institucional del sector y proponer las reformas normativas que correspondan para el diseño e implementación de un esquema institucional óptimo.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Keyword: Cooperative/producer organization,Institution,Community management,Financial agricultural measures,Special fund
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Regulation on technical environmental standards aimed to reduce the emissions of volatile organic compounds that occur during the filling of motor vehicles with petrol at petrol stations.
Policy_Content: This Regulation sets technical standards and necessary rules part of the environmental protection measures which should ensure the reduction of air pollution from emissions of volatile organic compounds that normally occur during the filling of motor vehicles with petrol at petrol stations or similar activities and locations.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force on 1 January 2011, except for the provisions contained in articles 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8 paragraph 1 line 3 and 4 and article 9 which shall enter into force on 1 January 2012.

Policy: Upper Austria Geo-Data Infrastructure Law
Policy_Content: The purpose of the present Law is to lay down rules aimed at the establishment of the infrastructure for spatial information in Upper Austria with a view to environmental policies and activities which may have an impact on the environment. The text consists of 20 articles divided into 7 Parts as follows: General provisions (1); Metadata, spatial data sets and spatial data services (2); Network services (3); Use of spatial data and spatial data services by competent authorities (4); Coordination and monitoring (5); Legal protection (6); Final provisions (7). Three Annexes are enclosed.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Western Europe

Policy: Regulation on the form, content and manner of keeping the Register of forest seed facilities.
Policy_Content: This Regulation prescribes the form, content and manner of keeping the Register of forest seed facilities, the conditions that must be met by forest seed facilities, registration standards, the application form for the issue of expert opinion, the form and manner of application and required documentation for mandatory registration of such facilities on the territory of the Croatian Republic.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force eight days after its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Regulation determining the official list of forest species.
Policy_Content: This Regulation (pursuant to article 3, paragraph 3 of the Law on forest reproductive material “Official Gazette of the Republic of Croatia” 75/2009) determines the list of all recognised and allowed forest species on the Croatian territory.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force on the day of its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Lower Saxony Geo-Data Infrastructure Law.
Policy_Content: The present Law implements the directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 14 March 2007 establishing an Infrastructure for Spatial Information in the European Community (INSPIRE). In particular, the Law provides the legal framework for the development and running of a spatial data infrastructure system in Lower Saxony as part of the national spatial data infrastructure. For the purpose of the present Law, a spatial data infrastructure (SDI) is a framework of spatial data, metadata, users and tools that are interactively connected in order to use spatial data in an efficient and flexible way. The text consists of 12 articles divided into 3 Parts and 1 Annex.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Upper Austria Geo-Data Infrastructure Law
Policy_Content: The purpose of the present Law is to lay down rules aimed at the establishment of the infrastructure for spatial information in Upper Austria with a view to environmental policies and activities which may have an impact on the environment. The text consists of 20 articles divided into 7 Parts as follows: General provisions (1); Metadata, spatial data sets and spatial data services (2); Network services (3); Use of spatial data and spatial data services by competent authorities (4); Coordination and monitoring (5); Legal protection (6); Final provisions (7). Policy: Arrêté du Gouvernement flamand portant octroi d'aides aux entreprises pour des investissements écologiques réalisés en Région flamande.
Policy_Content: Le présent arrêté du Gouvernement flamand porte octroi d'aides aux entreprises pour des investissements écologiques réalisés en Région flamande. Notamment, l’article 6 établit qu’une aide est uniquement octroyée à des entreprises qui répondent à la réglementation applicable en Région flamande. L'entreprise doit continuer à répondre à la présente réglementation jusqu'à cinq ans de la fin des investissements écologiques. A la date d'introduction de la demande d'aide, l'entreprise ne peut avoir de dettes arriérées auprès de l'Office national de Sécurité sociale. L’article 7 précise que les investissements écologiques doivent être entamés dans les six mois de la décision d'octroi d'aide et doivent être terminés dans les trois ans de la décision d'octroi d'aide. Le Ministre peut prolonger le délai dans lequel les investissements écologiques doivent être entamés lorsque l'entreprise n'a pas obtenu les autorisations demandées pour l'exécution des investissements écologiques dans les six mois de la décision d'octroi d'aide.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Resolución Nº 765/10/AG - Guía para la elaboración de los Programas de adecuación y manejo ambiental agrario.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba la Guía para la elaboración de los Programas de adecuación y manejo ambiental agrario, con la finalidad de que los titulares de los proyectos y/o empresas en funcionamiento que desarrollan actividades de competencia del sector agrario cuenten con los lineamientos para elaborar los procedimientos de gestión ambiental.
Subject: Environment gen.

Policy_Content: The Law 10360 of 2010 amends Article 92 of Law 10119 of 2009 by extending several time periods prescribed for starting with the full implementation of the Law from ‘no later than 15 January 2011’ to ‘no later than 30 September 2011’.

Policy_Content: El presente Decreto crea el Sistema Nacional de Emprendimiento, que tendrá a cargo el fomento de la cultura emprendedora, la articulación de los elementos que componen el proceso de formación y consolidación de proyectos empresariales y la coordinación interinstitucional de apoyo a la Política Nacional de Emprendimiento.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development

Policy: Law amending the Law on Forests.
Policy_Content: This Law lays down some amendments to the Law of Forests. In particular, the present Law amends provisions concerning the purchase of forests. Parcels of forest land less than 5 acres can be divided only if are not in spatial planning documents as a part of designated land use or forest, or this is necessary for the construction of public infrastructure, or are in joint ownership with the Republic of Slovenia or the local community.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Law entered into force on 11 January 2011.

Policy: Decree on co-financing of insurance premiums of agriculture production and fishery.
Policy_Content: The purpose of this Decree of the Republic of Slovenia, which is composed of 21 articles and five Annexes, is to encourage agricultural producers and fish farmers to maximize their production to overcome the negative consequences of natural disasters in agriculture and aquaculture. State support under this Decree shall be provided to the beneficiaries in agriculture and fisheries which are defined in art. 1 of this Decree. Annex 1 provides the list of types of agricultural production which is co-financed by insurance premiums.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Fisheries
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Decree entered into force on 1 January 2011.

Policy: Regional Law No. 72 “On mountainous areas”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law establishes legal grounds for the development of mountainous areas, conservation and rational management of natural resources and cultural heritage thereof. State policy in the sphere of mountainous areas shall be to ensure sustainable development thereof and improvement of quality of life of mountainous population, access to information related to mountainous areas and prevention of natural disasters (landslide, flooding, avalanches and other natural phenomena and calamities).
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Decreto Ley Nº 1.411/14 -Ley de reforma de la Ley Orgánica de Ciencia, Tecnología e Innovación.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley tiene por objeto dirigir la generación de una ciencia, tecnología, innovación y sus aplicaciones, con base en el ejercicio pleno de la soberanía nacional, la democracía participativa y protagónica, la justicia y la igualdad social, el respeto al ambiente y la diversidad cultural, mediante la aplicación de conocimientos populares y académicos.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
